reviewText: This is a great tutorial.  It was exactly what I was looking for.  Great instructions and the disc wasn't cheaply made like some other instructional dvds by other companies.
Excellent video. If you are planning on casting maquettes or small sculptures and want to learn how the pros do it, I recommend.

I have this DVD and the others as well. The information and subject are very nice indeed! These DVD's are keepers for sure. The info is all there and easy to understand; as well as, handy for future reference.

The only con is: Mr. Brown's favorite narration word seemed to be "umm", which made me a little nutty after an hour.
